attributes.action: introduce a salary cap of £40000 per year for all MP’s until Brexit is sorted.
attributes.background: MP’s continue year on year to get pay rise after pay rise whilst the rest of the country suffers to buy basic needs. They have done nothing to calm the fears of Brexit yet award themselves a pay rise. Obviously not target led bonuses! Until this mess is sorted out wages should be cut.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
